thread.title: OnePlus 2 launched, to be available in India from Aug 11 at Rs 24,999 price
thread.title_full: OnePlus 2 launched, to be available in India from Aug 11 at Rs 24,999 price | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: OnePlus 2 launched, to be available in India from Aug 11 at Rs 24,999 price
text:
Other Articles Hero MotoCorp to acquire certain assets of US based Eric Buell Racing Microsoft to launch Windows 10 tomorrow: Here's what that means Maruti Suzuki Q1 net surges 56% to Rs 1,193 cr, shares up Chinese handset maker OnePlus took the wraps off OnePlus 2 on Tuesday. The device will be in available in India from August 11 and will be priced at Rs 24,999.for the 64 GB version.
The 16GB version of OnePlus 2 with 3GB LPPDR4 RAM will be available later this year.
OnePlus 2 features a 5.5-inch display, the 4G-enabled OnePlus 2 sports 4GB RAM, 64-bit Snapdragon processor, 64GB memory, 13MP rear and 5MP front camera and a 3,300 mAh battery.
OnePlus on Tuedsay said it expects to sell one million units of its two devices — OnePlus One and Two — in five months as it eyes a bigger play in the multi-billion Indian smartphone market.
The device will be available from August 11 on e-commerce firm Amazon through the invite-only model.
“India is an important market for us. Outside of China, it is already the third largest market for us, after the US and Europe… We expect to sell one million units of OnePlus One and Two by December,” OnePlus India General Manager Vikas Agarwal said.
OnePlus had launched its first device in December last year and has sold about 2,50,000 units till date.
Agarwal said the company would continue to sell its OnePlus One handset in the country.
On OnePlus 2, Agarwal said the device boasts top of the line specs, one of the best camera in the market and a beautiful design.
“From day one, we’ve prioritised our product and our community above all else, we carefully listened to our users’ feedback and incorporated suggestions in building the OnePlus 2,” he said.
 28, 2015 12:46 pm © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd
